## Aeroflex (3G) TM500 Plus Control Script
# Generated by TM500 Plus Script Editor
# Copyright Aeroflex Cambridge Ltd
#----------------------------------------
# Script Editor Software Version: E4.0.4
#----------------------------------------
# Date Generated: 29/08/12
#----------------------------------------

##################################################
##                                              ##
##                  End HSDPA                   ##
##                                              ##
##################################################
#-----------------------------------------
## Removes the HSDPA Protocol at L1(CPHY)
## PARAMETERS
#-----------------------------------------
#  1.  Timing Type
#  2.  CommandTime
#-----------------------------------------
#                  1 2
#                  : :
forw L1TT EndHSDPA 1 0
#----------------------------------------

#Internal MDL Command WAIT for message containing specified string.
WAIT FOR "CPHY HSDPA END IND" TIMEOUT 300
#----------------------------------------

##################################################
##                                              ##
##                Delete DL DCH                 ##
##                                              ##
##################################################
#-----------------------------------------
## Delete a CCTrCH Control Block
## PARAMETERS
#-----------------------------------------
#  1.  CCB
#  2.  Timing Type
#  3.  Command Time
#-----------------------------------------
#                   1 2 3
#                   : : :
forw L1TT DeleteCCB 0 1 0
#----------------------------------------

#Internal MDL Command WAIT for message containing specified string.
WAIT FOR "DELETE DL CCTrCH Indication" TIMEOUT 300
#----------------------------------------

#-----------------------------------------
## Deletes a Downlink Physical Channel
## PARAMETERS
#-----------------------------------------
#  1.  DL PhCH Index
#-----------------------------------------
#                      1
#                      :
forw L1TT DeleteDLPhCH 0
#----------------------------------------

##################################################
##                                              ##
##                Delete UL DCH                 ##
##                                              ##
##################################################
#-----------------------------------------
## Delete a CCTrCH Control Block
## PARAMETERS
#-----------------------------------------
#  1.  CCB
#  2.  Timing Type
#  3.  Command Time
#-----------------------------------------
#                   1 2 3
#                   : : :
forw L1TT DeleteCCB 2 1 0
#----------------------------------------

#Internal MDL Command WAIT for message containing specified string.
WAIT FOR "DELETE UL CCTrCH Indication" TIMEOUT 300
#----------------------------------------

#-----------------------------------------
## Deletes an Uplink Physical Channel
## PARAMETERS
#-----------------------------------------
#  1.  UL PhCH Index
#-----------------------------------------
#                      1
#                      :
forw L1TT DeleteULPhCH 0
#----------------------------------------
